message.body: Hello! I'm doing well, kicking the work week into gear - it's slower than usual because I was out on Thursday and Friday for jury duty. How about you?
Ooooo, jury duty. Anything dramatic happen? It's the first Monday after I graduated from grad school - so it's weird and great. Hah
It was a pretty lackluster trial with zero evidence. It was an easy decision at least - congrats on your masters! What did you study?
Physical theatre and devised theatre making - meaning the ensemble makes the work instead of using a script. What do you do?
That sounds awesome - i work at a not for profit health care improvement organization - we're basically a think tank trying to find the best ideas for care world wide
That sounds really great. If I wasn't going into performance I would be looking into something similar actually related to medical anthropology.
Yes, I'm originally from Minnesota though. Are you in Philly too?
I'm in boston - went to college in philly - originally from Las Vegas - but spent college summers in the twin Cities because my wife went to macalester
Ah I see - I have lots of friends who went there! It's a great school
Yeah, it's a great community - how do you like philly?
